text:
R N
CHANNEL 9
AUSTIN, TEXAS 78712
July 10, 1964
Mr* James A, Fellows
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D, G,
Dear Jim:
The new schedule of payments for the scripts
and kit materials, which you outline in your letter
of July 8, will be eminently satisfactory*
On second thought,, omake that ’’imminently” .* *
as you can’t process the second payment too soon to
suit me.
Or is such haste unseemly in a lady of the
Old Southwest, queried she, up to her waist in the
termite-chawed ruins of the plantation house floor.
Impecuniously yours,
Marye D, Benjamin
(Moonlight Girl, ’08.)
SERVING THE SAN ANTONIO AND AUSTIN AREA
